caption:
Ever wonder how we can make healthcare better for us AND our planet, too? Bayer is rolling out a first-of-its-kind PET blister packaging for our brand Aleve. This eco-friendly packaging is a game-changer, significantly reducing:

🌱 carbon footprint by 38% 
💧water usage by 78% 
🌍 and land use by 53% 

It's more than just packaging; it's our commitment to a healthier planet and future for all. 

#Sustainability #Packaging #HealthForAll #HungerForNone
